divs: sighting detailsi was stopped at an intersection driving home when i saw 3 red\orange lights in the sky above the treeline. the crossroad at the intersection had a number of cars parked along it so my initial thought was that there were party balloons. i quickly realized that the lights were holding in a steady triangular formation and were slowly drifting south (in my direction) and they started shifting direction sort of following a river that i was about to cross. at this point i was trying to fish out my cell phone to take a picture but the camera app wouldn't start. i continued driving to the next intersection and had to wait for traffic as i watched the lights move out of sight, and my camera app decided to start working. after stopping at home i ventured back out in search of these lights. i do live about a mile from the local airport and i've never seen anything like these lights take off or land from there before, and it is a commercial airport. after driving completely around the downtown area, i took a different route back home and saw to the north of me (back towards the airport) a series of several dozen of these lights scattered across the sky, all holding formation in that none flickered, oscillated, shifted, turned, or exhibited any behavior that you would see if you released a balloon. at this point i pulled into a parking lot, took the attached picture, which i apologize for the quality, and tried to take several videos which didn't capture anything worth noting. i continued to watch the lights until they lessened and as i drove away i noticed another driver pull into the parking lot looking at the sky with the same 'wtf' expression that i had.
